articles.title: Australia captain Aaron Finch enters record books; joins elite list topped by Rohit Sharma - Times Now
articles.description: Aaron Finch joined an elite list during his 12-run knock in the first T20I of the three-match series against England. The Australia captain is now one of the six batsmen with 3000 runs in T20I cricket. The list is topped by Rohit Sharma. He is followed by Vir…
